lead_paragraph: The women, mostly white, said it wasn’t so much about voting against Hillary Clinton, but about the change they thought Mr. Trump would enact.

byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood contributed reporting from Old Town, Me., and Julie Turkewitz from Denver.

headline.print_headline: The Women Who Helped Trump to Victory . . .
headline.main: The Women Who Helped Donald Trump to Victory

snippet: The women, mostly white, said it wasn’t so much about voting against Hillary Clinton, but about the change they thought Mr. Trump would enact....
abstract: Interviews with women who supported Donald Trump's presidential candidacy reveal they believe Trump alone can fix what ails country; women, who played pivotal role in his victory, describe it as positive, rather than negative, vote; exit polls indicate 53 percent of all white women who voted cast their ballots for Trump.
